snippet: Pete Townshend and Roger Daltrey — with help from Pino Palladino, Simon Townshend and Zak Starkey — played all of “Quadrophenia” and some hits at Barclays Center.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews performance by classic rock band The Who at Barclays Center.
lead_paragraph: Pete Townshend and Roger Daltrey — with help from Pino Palladino, Simon Townshend and Zak Starkey — played all of “Quadrophenia” and some hits at Barclays Center.

headline.seo: The Who Plays ‘Quadrophenia’ at Barclays Center
headline.main: Portrait of 4-Man Band From Its 2 Survivors
headline.print_headline: Portrait of 4-Man Band From Its 2 Survivors
